requireMavenVersion.message: [ERROR] OLD MAVEN [${maven.version}] in use, Jetty ${project.version} requires Maven 3.0.0 or newer

requireJavaVersion.message: [ERROR] OLD JDK [${java.version}] in use. Jetty ${project.version} requires JDK 1.8.0 or newer

bannedDependencies.message: We use junit.jar, not junit-dep.jar (as of junit 4.11, hamcrest is no longer embedded)
